Package com.irurueta.server.commons.email

Class TextEmailMessageWithAttachments

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.EmailMessage
      • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.TextEmailMessage
        • com.irurueta.server.commons.email.TextEmailMessageWithAttachments
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments, JavaMailTextEmailMessageWithAttachments
    public abstract class TextEmailMessageWithAttachments
extends TextEmailMessage
    Base class for text only email messages containing file attachments.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.util.List<EmailAttachment> mAttachments
      List of attachments to be included in email.
